org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1
Class UserApi

java.lang.Object
  org.hyperic.hq.hqapi1.UserApi

public class UserApi
extends java.lang.Object

The Hyperic HQ User API.

This class provides access to the Users within the HQ system. Each of the methods in this class return Response objects that wrap the result of the method with a ResponseStatus and a ServiceError that indicates the error if the response status is ResponseStatus.FAILURE.

getUser

public UserResponse getUser(java.lang.String name)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Get a User by name.

Parameters:
name - The user name to search for.
Returns:
On ResponseStatus.SUCCESS, the User by the given name is returned via UserResponse.getUser().
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If a network error occurs while making the request.
